jcr:content.jcr:title: Fleet Management System
jcr:content.description: Telematics services connecting trucks, trailers and cars
jcr:content.subtitle: White label telematics platform
jcr:content.title: Connected Fleet

richtext.text: The market of telematics is evolving and moving toward an open Transport and Logistics ecosystem. It requires more open solutions, more real-time interactions and more mobility & analytics services.

challengestab.list: [{"imagePath":"/content/dam/worldline/images/icones-white/international-line-white.png"\,"title":"Open Platforms"\,"content":"One key trend in future transport and logistics is the integration of real-time data with third-parties. The fleet owner can exchange data with all his partners: the leaser\, the insurance\, the workshops\, the logistics company and the final user benefiting from the delivery service. Advanced API for real-time secure exchanges coupled with open exchange protocols such as RFMS are a must."},{"imagePath":"/content/dam/worldline/images/icones-white/like-line-white.png"\,"title":"Real-time interactions"\,"content":"Because every minute counts for the fleet owner to conduct his business\, he needs to be able to define and follow his Key Performance Indicators at a glance\, anytime\, anywhere."},{"imagePath":"/content/dam/worldline/images/icones-white/mobile-phone-line-white.png"\,"title":"Mobility & analytics services"\,"content":"Mobile app for the driver and advanced analytics are key elements to analyse and optimise fleet performances."},{"imagePath":"/content/dam/worldline/images/icones-white/connected-car-line-white.png"\,"title":"Trucks\, Trailers and Cars “à la Carte”"\,"content":"In the transport business\, fleet owners are managing mixed fleets for different activities. The aggregation of all of their fleets through a centralized view is then of paramount importance. Since each fleet owner can have different needs depending on the type and lifecycle of vehicles\, it’s essential to offer them different commercial packages that you can upsell."}]

titleh2.title: Engage your fleet customers through a unique white label commercial vehicles telematics platform

listtoggle.list: [{"acardion":"A core product coupled with telematics\, mobile and data analytics to develop and operate differentiating services"\,"text":"The Worldline white label platform includes an intuitive and high performance web portal through APIs. You can customize our platform and integrate it with your current offerings. Connectivity\, on-board units\, mobile app and data analytics can be added. Our experts can develop and customize the solution for your needs."},{"acardion":"Rich set of services influencing the TCO of the fleet and the business operations"\,"text":"This catalog of services (fuel performance\, driver and vehicle performances\, repair and maintenance) is constantly enriched to bring higher value to you and to fleet owners. Our real-time alerts and reporting have demonstrated to be among the best on the market. Some exclusive services can be added\, including a unique dashboard to allow a fleet manager to track his fleet performance. Every service can be subscribed individually by vehicle."},{"acardion":"Trucks\, trailers and cars unified"\,"text":"Different vehicle types are often managed by separated telematics platforms. 6 different on-board units are integrated by default and yours can be integrated additionally. Both OEM and after-market devices are supported. The In-Vehicle fitments process can be managed by back-office tools."},{"acardion":"Business partner"\,"text":"The Worldline team of fleet and vehicle data experts work hand in hand with you to design a personalized approach adapted to your activity\, including system integration. Worldline can deliver many other assets (billing\, web shop\, fuel cards\, mobile apps\, etc.) for a successful & long-term partnership."}]

[{"acardion":"A flexible core product"\,"text":"Can be distributed/integrated by any service distributor\,\\n No data ownership\,\\n Very large fleet support\, \\nFits OEM & aftermarket devices\, \\nDefault own 2G/3G SIM & Data Plan\\n"},{"acardion":"A wide set of fleet services"\,"text":"Fleet Key Performance Indicator dashboard\, \\nTrack & Trace services (Live Fleet\, Trip tracing)\, map & routing options (ETA\, routing etc.)\, & Driver performance services\, Trailer & Fridge services\, 2 way communication with back office\, Multi-channel alerting (SMS\, mail\, web services)\, Vehicle Health Monitoring & Service requests\, Report scheduling\, RFMS V1 & V2 API for data sharing\, Role-based access to groups of vehicles\, Configuration by vehicle type\, Commercial Packages & Vehicle Subscriptions\, Extensible to your needs\\n"},{"acardion":"Many options"\,"text":"Optional onboard software agent to facilitate integration\, Regular or on-demand descriptive & predictive analytics\, Driver Scoring analytics\, Collaborative data scientists\, Mobile App for driver or for fleet manager\, App Shop to upsell services\, Third-party services integration\, API Based\, In-Vehicle fitment \\n"}]

titleh2.title: Key benefits for your fleet managers

multisectoritem_copy.title: Pay per use / Pay as you drive business model

richtext.text: The Worldline Connected Vehicles Platform includes a rich catalog of services that are constantly updated. Contact us to discover all we can do with our Data Analytics platform and experts!

multisectoritem.description: Live map, alert logbook, POI, geofencing and corridoring
multisectoritem.title: Live fleet and vehicle tracking

multisectoritem_copy.description: Fleet Utilisation reporting, Trip tracing and alerts
multisectoritem_copy.title: Trip management

multisectoritem_copy.description: Fuel reports, ad-blue, overload, fuel deviation, idling and fuel loss
multisectoritem_copy.title: Fuel Performance

multisectoritem_copy.description: Alerts and daily reports on smartphone plus dashboards
multisectoritem_copy.title: Fleet operations at a glance

multisectoritem_copy_1131539633.title: Commercial packages and subscriptions

richtext.text: Boosted by the standard modules of Worldline’s Connected Vehicles solution, EFFITRAILERTM provides Michelin Solutions clients with a value-enhancing services package that optimizes management of their trailer fleet. EFFITRAILERTM receives real-time data from trucks (e.g. GPS location, tire pressure, stationary trucks etc.) that is uploaded to the reporting system on the fleet’s operations and performance and issues alerts ensuring real-time control

“EFFITRAILERTM improves haulage firms’ operating margins while strengthening the safety of their loads and enhancing delivery reliability. Thanks to the Worldline platform’s modularity and operational capacity, we rely on Worldline to develop innovative offers and to roll them out throughout Europe”. 
Philippe Miret, Michelin® Solutions CEO
